metadata.name: Assembly DLL Creation Via AspNetCompiler
metadata.comment: Detects the creation of new DLL assembly files by "aspnet_compiler.exe", which could be a sign of "aspnet_compiler" abuse to proxy execution through a build provider.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\aspnet_compiler.exe')) AND contains(lower(file.path), lower('\\temporary asp.net files\\')) AND contains(lower(file.path), lower('\\assembly\\tmp\\')) AND contains(lower(file.path), lower('.dll')))

output.summary: Detects the creation of new DLL assembly files by "aspnet_compiler.exe", which could be a sign of "aspnet_compiler" abuse to proxy execution through a build provider.

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate assembly compilation using a build provider Reference: Internal Research
